sentences.sContent: Viruses can be spread inadvertently by email users.
sentences.sCn: 病毒会被电子邮件用户无意中传播开来。

sentences.sContent: Robinson’s name was inadvertently omitted from the list.
sentences.sCn: 鲁宾逊的名字被人无意之中从名单上漏掉了。

words.tran: 疏忽的；不注意的（副词inadvertently）；无意中做的

trans.tranOther: without realizing what you are doing
